definition: surname Long/short for 吉隆坡[Ji2 long2 po1], Kuala Lumpur
surname Long/short for 吉隆坡[Ji2 long2 po1], Kuala Lumpur

sentences.english: Firecrackers boomed out from the front of a shop echoing loudly.
sentences.chinese: 前面的小店裏傳來的隆隆的爆竹聲。

sentences.english: It rolled on top of a sonorous vault.
sentences.chinese: 它在天頂上轟隆隆地行駛。

sentences.english: He led long a my hand to go home in the heavy rain bombing so.
sentences.chinese: 他就這樣，在轟隆隆的大雨中，牽着我的手回家了。

sentences.english: In a flash of gunpowder, a giant explodes onto the stage of history.
sentences.chinese: 在隆隆炮火的閃射中，歷史舞臺上出現了一個大人物。

sentences.english: The stillness of night was broken by the boom of a cannon.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚的寂靜被隆隆的炮聲打破。

sentences.english: We heard the distant roll of the big guns.
sentences.chinese: 咱們聽見遠方的隆隆的大炮聲。

sentences.english: It began as a deep rumble, shattering the predawn silence.
sentences.chinese: 一聲低沉的隆隆聲，打破了黎明前的寂靜。

sentences.english: The foghorn boomed out its warning.
sentences.chinese: 霧號轟隆隆地發出警告。
一列貨運列車隆隆地駛過。

sentences.english: She pressed on the accelerator,roaring the engine.
sentences.chinese: 她踩下油門踏板，使引擎隆隆作響。

sentences.english: A bus rumbles past the window.
sentences.chinese: 一輛巴士隆隆地穿過窗前。
炮兵轟隆隆地發出十九響禮炮。

sentences.english: A rumbling sound started, and the rats poured out from all of the houses.
sentences.chinese: 傳來一陣隆隆聲，老鼠從房子裏傾巢而出。

sentences.english: Years so rumbled out live another life in the slice.
sentences.chinese: 歲月就這麼轟隆隆攆過一個又一個生命中的切片。

sentences.english: They heard thunder muttering among the hills.
sentences.chinese: 他們聽見山中雷聲隆隆。

sentences.english: The tank was lumbering up a slope.
sentences.chinese: 坦克正隆隆地開上一個斜坡。

definition: loud sound, such as that of thunder or a bomb/to rumble/to roar
